忍.definition: to bear; to endure; to tolerate; to restrain oneself

忍俊不禁.definition: cannot help laughing; unable to restrain a smile

忍垢偷生.definition: to bear humiliation to save one's skin (idiom)

忍得住.definition: to refrain; to be able to endure it

忍心.definition: to have the heart to do sth; to steel oneself to a task

忍氣吞聲.definition: to submit to humiliation (idiom); to suffer in silence; to swallow one's anger; to grin and bear it

忍無可忍.definition: more than one can bear (idiom); at the end of one's patience; the last straw

忍痛割愛.definition: to resign oneself to part with what one treasures

忍者神龜.definition: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, US comic book series, first appeared in 1984, also films, video games etc

忍者龜.definition: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (Tw); see 忍者神龜|忍者神龟[Ren3 zhe3 Shen2 gui1]

忍耐.definition: to endure; to bear with; to exercise patience; to restrain oneself; patience; endurance

忍讓.definition: to exercise forbearance; patient and accommodating

忍辱偷生.definition: to bear humiliation to save one's skin (idiom)

忍辱求全.definition: to endure humiliation to preserve unity

忍辱負重.definition: to endure humiliation as part of an important mission (idiom); to suffer in silence
